nodes.text: The Si'Klaata Cluster was a star cluster in the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the planet Vodran, which was once ruled by Harra the Hutt. The mysterious moon Kufs was also located in the Si'Klaata Cluster.

The Si'Klaata Cluster was originally created for the 1995 Legends roleplaying supplement Galaxy Guide 12: Aliens — Enemies and Allies, published by West End Games. The location became canon when it was included in the 2017 children's book Join the Resistance.
